mapper.select: SELECT seq, roomPic, roomIdCD, reservAvailableYN, roomName, pricePerHour, roomRating, shortDescript, roomZipCode, roomStreetAddress, roomLotAddress, roomAddressRef, roomAddress, roomLatitude, roomLongitude, favoriteYN, roomDetail, roomIntro, roomGuideline, roomRegTime, roomModTime FROM room WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into room(
roomPic, roomIdCD, reservAvailableYN, roomName, pricePerHour, roomRating, shortDescript, roomZipCode, roomStreetAddress, roomLotAddress, roomAddressRef, roomAddress, roomLatitude, roomLongitude, favoriteYN, roomDetail, roomIntro, roomGuideline, roomRegTime, roomModTime, userInfo_seq )VALUES( #{roomPic}, #{roomIdCD}, #{reservAvailableYN}, #{roomName}, #{pricePerHour}, #{roomRating}, #{shortDescript}, #{roomZipCode}, #{roomStreetAddress}, #{roomLotAddress}, #{roomAddressRef}, #{roomAddress}, #{roomLatitude}, #{roomLongitude}, #{favoriteYN}, #{roomDetail}, #{roomIntro}, #{roomGuideline}, now(), now(), 1 )
SELECT last_insert_id()
